name: Filosofal
description:
Filosofal is my very first game :D! It was made for the BlackThornProd 3rd game jam (my first game jam also, hehe).

Your goal is to survive as long as posible, ¡avoid overloading and kill the enemies!.

                                                                                   Controls:

w a s d - move  |  space - dash  |  lMb - shoot  |  rMb - toggle shield  |  E - select  

|  Esc - pause  |  R - reset

Shooting and using your shield will ad to your overload, so be careful!

Everything in the game was made by me, except the crickets sounds, wich I took from a youtube video, and the music: Furious (Instrumental) · Sinyells.
